title: A Moon mask by Freda Deising
creator_credit: Geoff Voyce, North American Indian Films and B T Film-Sound
brief_description: Freda Deising, a Haida Indian of the Eagle clan, is an outstanding artist of the North West Coast. For this film she carves a beautiful moon mask from alder and decorates the mask with abalone.
creator_credit_for_label: Geoff Voyce, North American Indian Films and B T Film-Sound
description: Freda Deising, a Haida Indian of the Eagle clan, is an outstanding artist of the North West Coast. For this film she carves a beautiful moon mask from alder and decorates the mask with abalone.
